settings.text:
An exclusive curated collection of all-day sneakers for CRED Club members!   

Welcome to a world of fatigue-free feet! Styled for casual work dressing and designed to offer over 14 hours of unparalleled comfort. Ultra-lightweight, highly breathable, extra cushioned, knit fiber footwear that slips on effortlessly.

What customers are saying:

settings.testimonial_1: Supremely comfortable and stunningly stylish. Made heads turn on a recent international trip!
settings.testimonial_2: The shoes are great! Easy to get in and get out. Soles are soft and comfy. Easy to clean and they look great.

settings.testimonial_1: Got the flatheads shoe a few weeks ago and they are super comfortable and light on the feet. Definitely the best pair of shoes I have had in a long time! The slip-on feature is very nice and addictive!
settings.testimonial_2: At least 10 people in my office have noticed my new shoes and complemented me on them. So that's a great endorsement for the style quotient for me. I have been wearing them hours on end, including long travels and they have been very comfortable allowing me to walk many kilometres every day. So that's a great endorsement for me for the comfort and ergonomics... So style and function ! what more to ask for ?

What customers are saying:

Naveen Tewari

Founder & CEO, InMobi

I love sneakers and with Flatheads, it was the idea of a 'casual work sneaker' that got my attention. I got the Ooofs and they were super comfortable, and the slip on feature made them easy to wear. I found the concept of one-time laces quite cool too!

Rajiv Srivatsa

Co-founder, Urban Ladder

Talking to the Flatheads founders piqued my interest, and I got myself a pair. I’ve got to say that they have hit the brand promise of casual work sneakers bang on! I love my Flatheads and wear them most times I step out.

Saumil Majmudar

Founder and CEO, Sportz Village

Have been wearing Flatheads regularly since I bought them at launch. They sure keep my feet comfortable through the day while my head is going crazy dealing with the ups and downs in building Sportz Village!

settings.text: Flatheads are all-day casual sneakers designed for work wear and optimized for 14-hour comfort.

We've collaborated with Soxytoes to give your feet an unalike combination of style and comfort. Moreover, a super cool pair of socks is best showed off with an equally fly pair of sneakers!

Use code FH20 and get a 20% discount on your Flatheads order!

Designed for everyday wear

Lightweight

Weighs less than a glass of water

Slip-on

One time lacing

Breathable

Air conditioning for your feet

VIEW ALL →

Why Flatheads?

Flatheads shoes are designed for everyday wear. With lightweight materials and thoughtful design, we've created the everyday shoes you really need.

Ultra-Lightweight

Flatheads are ultralight. Lighter than a glass of water. Believe it.

Shop Now

Quick Slip On

Easy to wear. Lacing is one-time only!

Shop Now

10x Breathable

Knit-fiber uppers that are light and airy.

Shop Now

Supreme Comfort

Extra soft insoles and cushiony soles. Like walking on pillows.

Shop Now

Toe & Heel Protection

Ready from the get-go. No shoe-bites, ever.

Shop Now

14+ Hour Wear

Great for all day use. You’ll forget they are on your feet.

Shop Now

Easy Clean

Clean with a wet cloth, or dunk them in soapy cold water.

Shop Now

Easy to Pack

The lightweight knit uppers can be easily folded to fit into your travel bag.

Shop Now

Durable

Rip and tear resistant. Great for everyday casual wear.

Shop Now

settings.title: KAPOW 2.0
settings.subheading: Our best-selling 3D-knit shoes are now even better

settings.code:
Introducing

THE

KAPOW 2.0

Super lightweight, hassle-free slip-ons with ultra soft uppers.

settings.subtitle: THE
settings.title: KAPOW CHALK
settings.text: The all-whites you’ve been waiting for. An essential in your shoe closet, there’s nothing better than a white sneaker. Oh, and they're breathable too.

settings.subtitle: THE
settings.title: KAPOW ANTHRACITE
settings.text: A unique grey and black melange you’ll never get tired of. Complete with black soles, back on popular demand.

settings.code:
What’s new in the Kapow 2.0?

Softer, more flexible uppers

Experience comfort like never before with the super soft 3D knit uppers. Extremely lightweight soles. Feel like socks on your feet!

Easier to slip on

Broader mouth with a lowered ankle. Easy to slip on and off, and ready from the get go!

Free Shipping across India

1-Day dispatch

Hassle-free Exchange

settings.subtitle: KAPOW 2.0
settings.title: SHIPPING NOW
settings.text: FREE Delivery. Dispatches within 24 hours.

settings.title: Welcome to the club!
settings.text: As a token of our appreciation for supporting a homegrown brand, we would like to invite you to become a part of Flatheads #Unalike Club! This club membership is one of a kind and below is a list of benefits that come with it.

settings.code:
Get #Unalike Club membership

  • If you've purchased a pair of Flatheads shoes from our website, congratulations! You're an #Unalike Club Member. 🥳
  • If you are purchasing your first pair of Flatheads now, complete the Kapow 2.0 Launch Exclusive steps below and finish your purchase to become an #Unalike Club member.

KAPOW 2.0 LAUNCH EXCLUSIVE

#Unalike Club members get an additional 10% off on the new Kapow 2.0 collection. You can activate this benefit by following these steps:

  • Download the picture below (Click here)
  • Share it on your Instagram story and tag us @flatheadsofficial
  • That's it! You’ve unlocked your additional 10% discount. We'll DM you your discount code on Instagram.
SHOP NOW

Referral Hero:

  • Once you purchase a shoe on www.flatheads.in, you are eligible to become a Referral Hero.
  • As a referral hero, for every referral that you successfully convert, you get a discount of 10% on your next order, which adds up, all the way to 100%, once you convert 10 referrals.
  • Your referrals will be tracked with your unique referral code (you will receive this via email on completing your purchase) which will give your friends, family and acquaintances an instant 15% off on their first order.
  • For every 5 successful referrals, you are guaranteed a 50% off on the choice of your shoe from any collection.
  • For every 10 successful referrals, take home your choice of Flatheads from any collection, free of cost.

Cherished Patron:

  • Additionally, we will launch the newest collection exclusively to you for a period of 48 hours before we open it out to the world.
  • You will also get a 10% discount at pre launch applicable for 48 hours only.
  • You also get an extended return period, with additional 7 days, over and above the regular return period.
  • Furthermore, you get exclusive access to limited edition Flatheads branded merchandise.

settings.code:
Introducing

Flatheads
Aurea

Shoes made from Bamboo.
Live fresh.

Made from
natural bamboo

The Aurea is made with natural Bamboo which makes it extraordinarily cool. The bamboo uppers also lend the shoe its antimicrobial properties, making them retain their freshness longer.

The Aurea is made with natural Bamboo which makes it extraordinarily cool. The bamboo uppers also lend the shoe its antimicrobial properties, making them retain their freshness longer.

Extra-light plimsolls

Heavy soled plimsolls are a thing of the past. The ultra-light plimsoll form of the Aurea makes them great for all kinds of outfits.

Extra-light plimsolls

Heavy soled plimsolls are a thing of the past. The ultra-light plimsoll form of the Aurea makes them great for all kinds of outfits.

Supreme comfort

The signature Flatheads insoles in the Aurea are cushiony, and optimised to provide 14+ hours of comfort.

The signature Flatheads insoles in the Aurea are cushiony, and optimised to provide 14+ hours of comfort.

1. Browse the collection below and click on a shoe you would like to try

2. Click "Buy Now" to add the shoe to cart

3. Repeat the above steps to pick upto 3 shoes you would like to try.

4. Enter code FREETRIAL in the discount code box and checkout.

5. Fill in your shipping details and complete your order. Your free trial is booked!

Our delivery partner will visit your address within 2 days. You can try the shoes immediately and pick the one you like. Pay only for the shoes you've picked and we'll ship you a new pair. Your new shoes will be delivered within 2 days.

settings.code: 2021 is here and our hearts and soles are warm. At Flatheads, we wish to continue spreading this warmth to as many people as we can.

How it works:

  1. Add any pair of Flatheads shoes to your cart
  2. Enter "GIVE" in the discount code box and proceed to checkout
  3. Complete your purchase
  4. That's it! For every pair of shoes you buy at full price, we donate a pair to someone in need of shoes.

Explore all Flatheads shoes:

This gifting season, buy 1 shoe and get 50% off on your second shoe. 🎉

Simply pick any 2 shoes and use code GIFT50 when you checkout.

What Customers Are Saying

Naveen Tewari

Founder & CEO, InMobi

"I love sneakers and with Flatheads, it was the idea of a 'casual work sneaker' that got my attention. I got the Ooofs and they were super comfortable, and the slip on feature made them easy to wear. I found the concept of one-time laces quite cool too!"

Rajiv Srivatsa

Co-founder, Urban Ladder

"Talking to the Flatheads founders piqued my interest, and I got myself a pair. I’ve got to say that they have hit the brand promise of casual work sneakers bang on! I love my Flatheads and wear them most times I step out."

Ajinkya Malasane

Co-founder, Playment

"These shoes feel like wearing a soft T-shirt on my feet."

Bharath Jain

Team Lead, Sara Pre-school

"This is my first purchase from Flatheads and they're super lightweight, beautiful and comfortable all day. Cleaning is also easy. Will surely come back for another one."

Sailesh Hota

Senior Analyst, Everest Group

"If I were to describe how it feels to wear these shoes, I would say it feels like a sheet of air wrapped around my feet."

We want to thank our healthcare workers for standing with us through these tough times.

To make the long hours on your feet more comfortable, we’re offering Rs. 1000 off your purchase of Flatheads sneakers.

Use code
THANKYOU
and get Rs. 1000 off

Stay comfortable, stay safe.

settings.code: Customers Speak

Naveen Tewari

Founder & CEO, InMobi

I love sneakers and with Flatheads, it was the idea of a 'casual work sneaker' that got my attention. I got the Ooofs and they were super comfortable, and the slip on feature made them easy to wear. I found the concept of one-time laces quite cool too!

Rajiv Srivatsa

Co-founder, Urban Ladder

Talking to the Flatheads founders piqued my interest, and I got myself a pair. I’ve got to say that they have hit the brand promise of casual work sneakers bang on! I love my Flatheads and wear them most times I step out.

Saumil Majmudar

Founder and CEO, Sportz Village

Have been wearing Flatheads regularly since I bought them at launch. They sure keep my feet comfortable through the day while my head is going crazy dealing with the ups and downs in building Sportz Village!

What's special about Flatheads shoes?

10x Breathable

The knit fabric uppers are engineered to keep your feet cool, and sweat less.

Ultra-lightweight

A class apart from the heavy-soled plimsolls out there, the Ellipsis are extremely lightweight.

Supreme Comfort

The Ellipsis are optimised for over 14 hours of comfort. Like all-day pillows for your feet!

Meet

Troos

Slip-ons made with
Natural Bamboo

What is Troos?

Troos means ‘comfort’ in Afrikaans. An apt moniker for our very first mule that captures comfort within a chic aesthetic.

Troos means ‘comfort’ in Afrikaans. An apt moniker for our very first mule that captures comfort within a chic aesthetic.

Look Ma, no hands

Our Troos slips right on to your feet to help you kick-start your day, the comfortable way. That means we’re hands-free!

Fits into your daily routine

Slip-in and step-out for your daily To-Dos, from walking your dog to a morning grocery run!
